committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of September as National Sickle Cell Month.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating September as "National Sickle Cell Month."

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of September as National Sickle Cell Month.
